resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103186</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103186</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086743</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">PLoS Genetics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PLoS Genetik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Génétique de PLoS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Genetics De PLoS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Genetica Di PLoS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PLoS γενετική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Genética De PLoS</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">PLoS Genetics reflects the full breadth and interdisciplinary nature of genetics and genomics research by publishing outstanding original contributions in all areas of biology � human studies as well as research on model organisms � from mice and flies, to plants and bacteria.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PLoS Genetik reflektiert die volle Breite und die 
interdisziplinäre Natur der Genetik- und genomicsforschung, indem sie
hervorragende ursprüngliche Beiträge in allen Bereichen der Biologie
veröffentlicht? Mensch Studien, sowie Forschung auf 
vorbildlichen organismen? von den Mäusen und von den Fliegen zu
den Betrieben und zum Bakterium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La génétique de PLoS reflète la pleine largeur 
et la nature interdisciplinaire de la recherche de la génétique et 
de génomique en éditant des contributions initiales exceptionnelles 
dans toutes les zones de biologie ? études d'humain comme la 
recherche sur les organizations modèles ? des souris et des 
mouches, aux usines et aux bactéries.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O genetics de PLoS reflete a largura cheia e a 
natureza interdisciplinary da pesquisa do genetics e do genomics 
publicando contribuições originais proeminentes em todas as áreas 
de biologia? estudos do ser humano assim como a pesquisa sobre 
os organismos modelo? dos ratos e das moscas, às plantas e às 
bactérias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La genetica di PLoS riflette la larghezza completa
e la natura interdisciplinare di ricerca di genomics e della genetica 
pubblicando i contributi originali eccezionali in tutte le zone di 
biologia? studi dell'essere umano come pure ricerca sugli 
organismi di modello? dai mouse e dai mosche, alle piante ed ai 
batteri.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PLoS η γενετική απεικονίζει το πλήρες εύρος και τη
διεπιστημονική φύση της έρευνας γενετικής και genomics με την 
έκδοση των σημαντικών αρχικών συνεισφορών σε όλους τους τομείς 
της βιολογίας; ανθρώπινες μελέτες καθώς επίσης και έρευνα 
για τους πρότυπους οργανισμούς; από τα ποντίκια και τις 
μύγες, στις εγκαταστάσεις και τα βακτηρίδια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿La genética de PLoS refleja la anchura completa 
y la naturaleza interdisciplinaria de la investigación de la 
genética y del genomics publicando contribuciones originales 
excepcionales en todas las áreas de la biología? ¿estudios del
ser humano tan bien como la investigación sobre los organismos 
modelo? de ratones y de moscas, a las plantas y a las bacterias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086743</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

FN:OERCommons

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103186</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/plos-genetics</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
